price: 11. Zeg o, Mohammed: “De engel des doods, die over jullie beschikt zal jullie zielen nemen, dan zullen jullie tot jullie Heer gebracht worden.”
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qul yatawaffākum malaku al-mawti alladhī wukkila bikum thumma ilā rabbikum tur'jaʿūna
